newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China Treasure in property sales talk.
newsitem.headline: China Treasure in property sales talk.

text.p: China Treasure Telecom Holdings Ltd said on Thursday it is holding preliminary talks about the possible sale of a property investment in China.

"The company is currently in preliminary negotiation with an independent third party in relation to the possible disposal of the company's investment in Sun City, Huiyang county, Guangdong province, China," it said in a statement to the stock exchange.
No binding agreement had been reached, it said.
The company also said it was not aware of any reason for the recent increase in the price and trading volume of its shares.
China Treasure shares rose 0.5 cent to HK$0.285 with 3.83 million shares traded early Thursday. They rose nearly 12 percent this week against their Friday close of HK$0.255.
The cordless telephone designer and manufacturer advised shareholders and potential investors to exercise caution in their dealings in shares of the company.
